g.text: Never forget anything again. Transform your WhatsApp into an
intelligent personal assistant that remembers, reminds,
✓ No credit card required • ✓ 14-day free trial • ✓ Cancel anytime
Everything you need to stay organized, accessible right where you chat every day
voice or text. Get notified exactly
Simply save our number and send a message. Get started in under 30 seconds.
Tell Memorae what you need to remember, just like talking to a friend. No commands to learn.
Memorae organizes, reminds, and keeps you on track automatically. Focus on what matters.
Join 50,000+ users who trust Memorae to keep their lives organized
